coding_practice.title: Assign Cookies
coding_practice.description:
Assume you are an awesome parent and want to give your children some cookies. But, you should give each child at most one cookie.

Each child i has a greed factor g[i], which is the minimum size of a cookie that the child will be content with; and each cookie j has a size s[j]. If s[j] >= g[i], we can assign the cookie j to the child i, and the child i will be content. Your goal is to maximize the number of your content children and output the maximum number.

examples.explanation:
You have 3 children and 2 cookies. The greed factors of 3 children are 1, 2, 3. And even though you have 2 cookies, since their size is both 1, you could only make the child whose greed factor is 1 content.
You need to output 1.

You have 2 children and 3 cookies. The greed factors of 2 children are 1, 2. 
You have 3 cookies and their sizes are big enough to gratify all of the children, You need to output 2.

coding_practice.note: his question is the same as 2410: Maximum Matching of Players With Trainers.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 將孩子的貪心值 g 和餅乾尺寸 s 都排序。
2. 使用雙指針 i, j 遍歷 g 和 s。
3. 如果 s[j] >= g[i]，將餅乾分配給孩子，i 前進。
4. j 無論如何都前進。
5. 返回 content 的孩子數量 i。
